slide.title: View Source: Response
slide.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="iso-8859-1"?> <methodResponse> <params> <param> <value> <struct> <member> <name>packageid</name> <value> <string>17</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>name</name> <value> <string>XML_RPC</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>type</name> <value> <string>pear</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>categoryid</name> <value> <string>23</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>category</name> <value> <string>Web Services</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>stable</name> <value> <string>1.0.4</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>license</name> <value> <string>PHP License</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>summary</name> <value> <string>PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>homepage</name> <value> <string/> </value> </member> <member> <name>description</name> <value> <string>This is a PEAR-ified version of Useful inc's XML-RPC
for PHP. It has support for HTTP transport, proxies and authentication.</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>releases</name> <value> <struct> <member> <name>1.0.4</name> <value> <struct> <member> <name>id</name> <value> <string>258</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>doneby</name> <value> <string>ssb</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>license</name> <value> <string/> </value> </member> <member> <name>summary</name> <value> <string/> </value> </member> <member> <name>description</name> <value> <string/> </value> </member> <member> <name>releasedate</name> <value> <string>2002-10-10 00:55:00</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>releasenotes</name> <value> <string>* added HTTP proxy authorization support (thanks to Arnaud Limbourg)</string> </value> </member> <member> <name>state</name> <value> <string>stable</string> </value> </member> </struct> </value> </member> </scruct> </value> </member> </struct> </value> </param> </params> </methodResponse>
